headline.print_headline: With a Destination Set, So Are the Yankees
headline.seo: With a Destination of Baltimore Set, So Are the Yankees
headline.main: With a Destination Set, So Are the Yankees

docs.snippet: The Yankees had to wait on the outcome of a play-in game between the Orioles and Rangers before they knew they would open the postseason in Baltimore....
docs.abstract: New York Yankees, top seed in the American League, will face Baltimore Orioles in division series playoff; team had to wait on outcome of play-in game between Orioles and Texas Rangers before they knew they would be heading to Baltimore.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Yankees had to wait on the outcome of a play-in game between the Orioles and Rangers before they knew they would open the postseason in Baltimore.

headline.print_headline: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Fatal Bus Crash in Bronx
headline.seo: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Casino Bus Crash on I-95
headline.main: Passenger Recounts Chaos of Fatal Bus Crash in Bronx

docs.snippet: As the trial of the bus driver, Ophadell Williams, continued, a woman whose seat assignment may have saved her testified, and prosecutors showed a video of the accident’s aftermath....
docs.abstract: Passenger Truc Thanh Tran, whose seat may have saved her on an ill-fated World Wide Travel bus trip to the Mohegan Sun casino in Connecticut, testifies at the manslaughter trial of bus driver Ophadell Williams.
docs.lead_paragraph: As the trial of the bus driver, Ophadell Williams, continued, a woman whose seat assignment may have saved her testified, and prosecutors showed a video of the accident’s aftermath.

headline.print_headline: Napa Maker of Prized Kosher Wine Says His Faith Came Through the Vine
headline.seo: Napa Maker of Covenant Kosher Wine Says Work Led to Faith
headline.main: Napa Maker of Prized Kosher Wine Says His Faith Came Through the Vine

docs.snippet: Jeff Morgan, 59, whose childhood home had a Christmas tree, said making acclaimed wines under the Covenant label sent a “wayward Jew like me back to Judaism.”...
docs.abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column describes way in which Jeff Morgan, man behind Covenant label of California wines, was led back to Judaism by his making of kosher wine.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeff Morgan, 59, whose childhood home had a Christmas tree, said making acclaimed wines under the Covenant label sent a “wayward Jew like me back to Judaism.”

headline.print_headline: Living on His Own, Far From the Box
headline.seo: Living on His Own, Far From the Box
headline.main: Living on His Own, Far From the Box

docs.snippet: John Cornelius Foley has moved away from the Bowery where he spent many years. For some of that time, he lived in a wooden box on Broome Street....
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on John Cornelius Foley, who has moved away from the Bowery, where he lived, almost like a human museum piece in an exhibit about the Bowery as a skid row, in a wooden box on the street; Foley has started life over in a newly renovated rent-subsidized efficiency apartment in the Bronx that is owned by the Postgraduate Center for Mental Health.
docs.lead_paragraph: John Cornelius Foley has moved away from the Bowery where he spent many years. For some of that time, he lived in a wooden box on Broome Street.

headline.print_headline: Defiant Message Amid Iran Currency Crisis
headline.seo: Iranian Leaders Defiant Even as Currency Falls
headline.main: Defiant Message Amid Iran Currency Crisis

docs.snippet: At Friday Prayer, clerics accused the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, and asserted that the currency crisis would ease....
docs.abstract: Senior Iranian clerics accuses the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, asserting the currency crisis will ease; message comes as Western officials contemplate tightening sanctions even further.
docs.lead_paragraph: At Friday Prayer, clerics accused the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, and asserted that the currency crisis would ease.

headline.main: The Week’s Business News in Pictures

docs.snippet: Auto sales show renewed strength, workers protested a Walmart in California and the September unemployment report topped expectations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Auto sales show renewed strength, workers protested a Walmart in California and the September unemployment report topped expectations.

headline.print_headline: Accident Suspected In Death At Border
headline.seo: Accident Suspected in Agent’s Death on Mexican Border
headline.main: Accident Suspected in Agent’s Death on Mexican Border

docs.snippet: Federal authorities said there were “strong preliminary indications” that a Border Patrol agent who was killed on Tuesday was shot by another agent....
docs.abstract: Federal authorities say there are strong preliminary indications that Nicholas Ivie, Border Patrol agent killed in shooting in Arizona near border with Mexico, was accidentally shot by another agent.
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said there were “strong preliminary indications” that a Border Patrol agent who was killed on Tuesday was shot by another agent.

headline.print_headline: New Clashes at Site in Jerusalem Holy to Both Muslims and Jews
headline.main: New Clashes at Site in Jerusalem Holy to Both Muslims and Jews

docs.snippet: Two Israeli police officers were slightly injured during a clash at a holy site in Jerusalem that erupted during a demonstration after Friday Prayer....
docs.abstract: Two Israeli police officers are slightly injured during protest in Jerusalem at holy site, fiercely contested by both Muslims and Jews, that erupted during a demonstration after Friday Prayer; compound has been operated by Muslim group since Israel captured East Jerusalem during the 1967 war; Jews are allowed to visit site, but not pray there.

byline.contributor: Khaled Abu Aker and Isabel Kershner contributed reporting.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two Israeli police officers were slightly injured during a clash at a holy site in Jerusalem that erupted during a demonstration after Friday Prayer.

docs.snippet: Corrections appearing in print on October 6, 2012....
docs.lead_paragraph: Corrections appearing in print on October 6, 2012.

headline.print_headline: Group Buying L.I. Estate for Tesla Memorial
headline.seo: Group Buying Long Island Estate for Tesla Memorial
headline.main: Group Buying L.I. Estate for Tesla Memorial

docs.snippet: Enthusiasts of Nikola Tesla, an eccentric genius who lit the world with alternating current but died penniless, have finally succeeded in raising enough money to buy the property....
docs.abstract: Enthusiasts of Nikola Tesla, best known for establishing alternating current as the basis for modern electricity, raise enough money to buy the inventor's only surviving workshop, which sits on 16 acres in Shoreham, Long Island; group purchased the crumbling brick structure, designed by Stanford White, for around $1.4 million, and plans to create a museum and educational memorial.
docs.lead_paragraph: Enthusiasts of Nikola Tesla, an eccentric genius who lit the world with alternating current but died penniless, have finally succeeded in raising enough money to buy the property.
